TouchEventMetaKey.summary: The read-only metaKey property of the interface returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the <kbd>Meta</kbd> key is enabled when the touch event is created. If this key is enabled, the attribute's value is true. Otherwise, it is false.

blockquote.para: Note: On Macintosh keyboards, this is the <kbd>⌘ Command</kbd> key. On Windows keyboards, this is the Windows key (<kbd>⊞</kbd>).

TouchEventMetaKey.value: A boolean value that is true if the <kbd>Meta</kbd> key is enabled for this event; and false if the <kbd>Meta</kbd> is not enabled.
